channel.title: ...runescape classic!
channel.description:
[img]http://s28.postimg.org/i0gcakr8t/topbanner.png[/img] [b]YOU HAVE COME TO THE RIGHT SPOT.[b] 75x Experience Rates[/b] *Mac user friendly*
[b][url=http://Slaypk.no-ip.org]Slaypk World Forums[/url][/b]
PKing skill to level. Clan chat and development is now in the server and will get better over time. General store has ammies and potions Master Fisher gives [b]FREE Swordfish. 99 max stat! slaypk p2p!
GREEN DRAGS at the lava maze drop mass coins n bloods, occasional rune weapon. Try your shot to get a SLAY PKER AXE from chronozon the blood demon. [img]http://s22.postimg.org/706i7bwnl/screenshot8.png[/img]
[b]Introducing Zerdoga! (level 1360)[/b] Dropping rune and dragon chains, legs, 2h' and more! [img]http://s10.postimg.org/jeue22wex/screenshot5.png[/img] **Edgeville shop sells gauntlets, strength potions,Super potion sets, Prayer potions, and ammys.**[/b]
Pure Pk Square-- 1-10 def pures only.(boxed off area in the wilderness to have low level wars) P2p wilderness
[b]Commands[/b] *** ::help (to show a list of commands available)*** [b]::buy (buy arrows,bolts, runes quickly)[/b] ::dm ( takes you and another to death match to 1 v 1) [b]::varrock (tellys you by bank on edge of varrock wild)[/b] [b]::edge (tellys you on the road by edgeville wild)[/b] [b]::dragons (tellys you to dragons in the wilderness)[/b] ::skull (will skull your character for a set amount of time) ::castle (tellys you to the castle) ::online (shows a list of the players online, it can also be seen on the Homepage) ::fatigue (sets your fatigue to 100%, so you don't earn unwanted experience) ::say (to talk globally with everyone in the world) [b] ::wildy ( see whos in the wild)[/b] [b]The Website[/b] [url=http://slaypk.no-ip.org/]Click here to go to website[/url] [b]Client download is on the homepage and forums. [/b]
Crazy Lotterys! [img]http://s27.postimg.org/ocxypw91f/screenshot17.png[/img] [b]make money[/b] When first starting out you pop up in edgeville. There is a nice area where you can immediately start mining or fishing to make money. If this skilling is not your cup of tea then the monsters in edgeville drops decent to get you started out fast. chickens drops coins, 9 man drops up to addy 2h, full iron, decent coins. 31 Skellys drop decent stuff and coins, Guards drop decent coins and random ruby ammys. Once you feel confident then you can venture in the wilderness where you wil get double experience rates. Also, the monsters in the wilderness drop good stuff. 13 alter is filled with lesser demons and outside is a couple of greaters.. dropping decents cash and up to rune b axes, and r2h's. ::Dragons range them and loot. Black Demons drop rune armours and wepons, coins, bloods, deaths and they are found in the wilderness north of the castle inside of the bandit camp.... if you dont want to walk then simply use the portal in edgeville to get there. LAVA maze is the prime location where there is green dragons that drop cash bloods and rune weapons. at the end of the maze there is a ladder to get to the only king black dragon in the game. [img]http://i18.servimg.com/u/f18/19/27/46/11/screen15.png[/img]

item.title: ...runescape classic!
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:

Coming to SlayPk for the first time we now have a refer a friend program to get a benefit from doing so.
Referring a friend to Play with us here at slaypk will gain you a free Subscription for 3 days, which has many benefits.

Also,There is a new skill in the game now called “Pking”.
When pking in the wilderness will have 3 options- kill someone higher level than you, kill someone lower level than you, or die.
Killing a player that is higher level than yourself will result in more exp than say, if you were to kill a lower level player.
the catch-- if you die then your pking skill will actually be reduced. To maintain a high pk level you must keep that kill ratio above your deaths!

Looking into maybe added some clan related stuff for the server.

Read full topic

item.title: ...runescape classic!
item.dc:creator: @Interstellar Interstellar
item.description:
@Interstellar wrote:

Overall unique server, high exp rate is an incentive that takes away that grind feel
New bosses and drops that most servers don’t have is a big plus
Very easy for newcomers to get started in edgeville
Playerbase is relatively helpful at times
Admin is online occasionally

Only suggestions I have is to add more items to shop where skilling isn’t popular eg. more arrows, more ammies, legends cape?, zammy pots, and maybe sharks in general store…

Also have you planned when to release halloween masks or other rares? You could add combat stats to them to take away the purely cosmetic appeal, so people would pk in them

A +1 from me

Read full topic

item.title: ...runescape classic!
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:

Mikeyzzz:

Never played an RSC server, I’m going to hop on now, need someone to walk me through tho.

No problem, glad to help bro.

@ Zerdoga reintroduced to the server – drops drags legs and 2 handed sword along with various others!

more and more drops rates are being altered and more monsters being added to the world each day.

The blood demon Still drops a very POWERful slay pk axe! try it out–go to the wilderness agility couurse and dow nthe ladder inside there.

Read full topic

item.title: ...runescape classic!
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:

Raiden.:

Like PK servers you have to grind to get decent items? This is this is the place for you.

I laughed at this. Players are practically give out r2h’s and there are free swordfish… You could be on pking rather than being immature buddy.

@Everyone else dragonns drop thousands of gold and rune, but be prepared and have your anti fire shield or get burned!

Read full topic

item.title: ...runescape classic!
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:


[b]YOU HAVE COME TO THE RIGHT SPOT. 75x Experience Rates
Mac user friendly

Slaypk World Forums

PKing skill to level.
Clan chat and development is now in the server and will get better over time.
General store has ammies and potions
Master Fisher gives [b]FREE Swordfish.
99 max stat!
slaypk p2p!

GREEN DRAGS at the lava maze drop mass coins n bloods, occasional rune weapon.
Try your shot to get a SLAY PKER AXE from chronozon the blood demon.

Introducing Zerdoga! (level 1360)
Dropping rune and dragon chains, legs, 2h’ and more!

Edgeville shop sells gauntlets, strength potions,Super potion sets, Prayer potions, and ammys.[/b]

Pure Pk Square-- 1-10 def pures only.(boxed off area in the wilderness to have low level wars)
P2p wilderness

Commands
*** ::help (to show a list of commands available)***
::buy (buy arrows,bolts, runes quickly)
::dm ( takes you and another to death match to 1 v 1)
::varrock (tellys you by bank on edge of varrock wild)
::edge (tellys you on the road by edgeville wild)
::dragons (tellys you to dragons in the wilderness)
::skull (will skull your character for a set amount of time)
::castle (tellys you to the castle)
::online (shows a list of the players online, it can also be seen on the Homepage)
::fatigue (sets your fatigue to 100%, so you don’t earn unwanted experience)
::say (to talk globally with everyone in the world)
::wildy ( see whos in the wild)
The Website
Click here to go to website
Client download is on the homepage and forums.

Crazy Lotterys!

make money
When first starting out you pop up in edgeville. There is a nice area where you can immediately start mining or fishing to make money.
If this skilling is not your cup of tea then the monsters in edgeville drops decent to get you started out fast.
chickens drops coins, 9 man drops up to addy 2h, full iron, decent coins.
31 Skellys drop decent stuff and coins,
Guards drop decent coins and random ruby ammys.
Once you feel confident then you can venture in the wilderness where you wil get double experience rates. Also, the monsters in the wilderness drop good stuff.
13 alter is filled with lesser demons and outside is a couple of greaters… dropping decents cash and up to rune b axes, and r2h’s.
::Dragons range them and loot.
Black Demons drop rune armours and wepons, coins, bloods, deaths and they are found in the wilderness north of the castle inside of the bandit camp…
if you dont want to walk then simply use the portal in edgeville to get there.
LAVA maze is the prime location where there is green dragons that drop cash bloods and rune weapons.
at the end of the maze there is a ladder to get to the only king black dragon in the game.

Read full topic
